headline: Monster Beverage (MNST): Assessing Valuation After Record Sales and Surging International Growth
summary: Monster Beverage (MNST) stock is in focus after the company delivered a record-breaking quarter. Net sales, gross profit, and overall earnings all reached previous highs, supported by a 17% increase in revenue and strong international growth. See our latest analysis for Monster Beverage. Monster Beverage’s stellar quarter comes alongside impressive share price momentum, with the stock climbing 43% year-to-date. That surge reflects not just growing optimism around its international expansion,...

headline: 2 High-Flying Stocks on Our Buy List and 1 We Find Risky
summary: Expensive stocks typically earn their valuations through superior growth rates that other companies simply can’t match. The flip side though is that these lofty expectations make them particularly susceptible to drawdowns when market sentiment shifts.
